column3: Please find 10 relevant and diverse sources about [provided content] published in the last year. Include academic journals, media articles, and blogs.
What are some high quality but lesser known sources discussing [provided content]? Please list 5 articles from niche publications or experts.
Please list 8-10 recent sources about [provided content] that represent a wide range of perspectives and arguments.
Please summarize this [provided content] in 250 words focusing on the key ideas and arguments.
Please provide a 150 word summary of this [provided content] making sure to capture the hypotheses, methodologies and conclusions.
Please summarize this [provided content] transcript in 100 words including the central themes and claims made.
Please give a high-level overview of this [provided content] in 125 words covering the main concepts and ideas.
Please compress this [provided content] into a 75 word summary consisting of their background, achievements and views.
Please reduce this [provided content] into a 150 word synopsis focusing on the major policy positions and vision.
Please provide a 250 word abstract of this [provided content] summarizing the problem, approach, results and implications.
Please analyze this [provided content] and highlight 3-5 key ideas, 2-3 logical flaws or fallacies, and any contradictions.
Please review this [provided content] and identify 2-3 limitations, biases or gaps in the methodology and data.
Please read this [provided content] and note 2-3 unsubstantiated claims, questionable assumptions, and any logical inconsistencies.
Please analyze this [provided content] and point out weak points in reasoning, cognitive biases, and logical fallacies employed.
Please critically assess this [provided content] and indicate any instances of exaggeration, spin, or projection.
Please examine this [provided content] and identify any selective omissions, one-sided portrayals, or distortions of facts/data.
Please read this [provided content] and flag any misleading statistics, spin, or gaps relative to industry norms.
Please review this [provided content] and highlight 2-3 rhetorical devices, unstated assumptions, and potential logical flaws.
Based on this [provided content], please propose 2-3 novel connections or perspectives I could explore in my own work.
After reviewing this [provided content], please suggest 3-5 innovative angles or approaches I could take in developing my own ideas.
Having analyzed this [provided content], what are 2-3 non-obvious ways I could synthesize these concepts into unique ideation?
Based on this [provided content], what are 3 outside-the-box ways I might expand upon or contradict the arguments made?
Please help inspire a new direction based on this [provided content]: suggest 2 radical visions of what [concept] could evolve into someday.
Given this [provided content], how might we reframe or subvert this topic to develop truly unconventional ideas?
Please generate 3 headline and social media caption variations for this [provided content].
Please come up with 5 different titles and 3 subheadings for this [provided content] to optimize engagement.
Please suggest 2 short descriptions and 3 calls to action for this [provided content].
Please give me 2 alternative titles and 1-sentence hooks for this [provided content] to test audience response.
Please propose 4 different titles and 2 social media promo images for this [provided content].
Let's have a 10 minute discussion about the key arguments in this [provided content]. Please challenge any flawed reasoning and provide constructive feedback.
I'd love to brainstorm for 15 minutes on how to develop the ideas in this [provided content] into compelling thought leadership. Please share candid creative feedback.
Can we discuss this [provided content] for 20 minutes? Please poke holes in the logic, suggest strengthening arguments, and provide editing feedback.
Let's discuss this [provided content] for 10 minutes - please give feedback on what resonates and where it could be improved.
Please help think through the metaphors/analogies in this [provided content]. Discuss for 5 minutes - are they effective? How could they be clarified or refined?
Let's debate the merits and downsides of the ideas in this [provided content] for 10 minutes. Please challenge assumptions and logic - give counterarguments.
